summary:
Antisemitism is when people dislike or treat Jews unfairly just because of their religion or where they come from. It's a type of racism. Some people might not like Jews because they think they are a different race with bad traits, or because of their religious beliefs. This has led to many sad events in history, like violence, pogroms, and even genocide.

The word "antisemitism" is tricky; it doesn't mean hatred of all Semitic people (which is a made-up idea). It's just a fancy way to say "Jew-hatred."
title: Antisemitism
